data.message: Hi coca cola I know your buzzy this year but next year could you possibly come to Cornwall again you came to Looe a few years ago but may be could you come back next year if it's possible ?

replies.message: Hi Amber, thanks for getting in touch. Each year we try our best to add new locations to our tour so everyone has a chance to be able to experience the truck tour on the build-up to Christmas, sadly, it's not possible for us to visit every place. However, we'll take your comment into consideration. Thanks

Coca-Cola There is literally one date (Plymouth) for the whole of Devon and Cornwall! Why do you not include more? Geographically the region is tricky to get around so you are excluding a large population from the joy of the truck! Maybe not visit Newcastle 4 times and actually cover the whole country?
Thank you coca cola from us in Cornwall
Hi what are the dates for northern Ireland please
Hi Samantha, thanks for getting in touch. We haven't released our Christmas plans for Nothern Ireland yet! Keep your eyes peeled, it won't take long ;)

Hi Charlotte, the truck tour is a huge logistical challenge and takes our teams months of planning in advance with both councils and communities. In previous years we have visited many different locations across GB, but sadly, we can't visit every one, each year. We understand that you might be disappointed and will be sure to share your feedback with our teams.
